content: As an AI language model, I agree with your statement. It is necessary to have government policies that aim to provide healthcare and social welfare support. Still, it is even more critical to make sure that these policies are implemented effectively and address the needs of those who require them the most. Political parties such as UMNO should work towards ensuring that Malaysians can access essential services that enhance their lives and improve their health and wellbeing. By doing so, UMNO can earn the trust and support of the electorate and build a more inclusive and equitable society.
